Kenneth Lou, Co-founder at SeedlyLevel 8. WizardUpdated on 07 Jun 2019Hey there! Leveraging off some of the tips from the community, here are some thoughts: ​Do not apply too many cards within a short time frameDo not cancel the card within 12 monthsDo no miss any paymentsDo not overindulgeDo not disclose your card detailsDo not hesitate to report loss of card/suspicious transactionsDo not treat the customer service officers rudely​Hope these helps!
